N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 100.6 - Reports, review and evaluation of service

State Regulations
(a) Local governmental unit and/or directors
of community mental health services shall submit such reports as may be
required by the State Commissioner of Mental Hygiene. (b) The Commissioner of Mental Hygiene or any
authorized representatives of the State Department of Mental Hygiene may visit, examine, inspect and investigate any service or facility for which State aid is
claimed under article 11 of the Mental Hygiene Law to determine whether the
services and facilities are being conducted in compliance with the provisions
of the law and regulations relating thereto. (c) The Commissioner of Mental Hygiene or his
authorized representatives shall have the right to examine the financial
accounts and related records of any local governmental unit or voluntary agency
under contract. Notes
